page.title: 16A Typical Sunday in Solihull
page.content: I usually get up at about 10.00am. Dad is out playing golf and my brother is playing snooker. I take the dog out for a run with my friend Jane. After that I usually do any homework that is left over from the week. Mum cooks the lunch for about 2.00pm.Sometimes I help her with the washing up and then watch a bit of T.V. If it is a nice day I go outside and sunbathe or do some gardening. If there's nothing else to do I go down the road to my friend's house and we watch T.V. or cook or just talk. At about 6.00pm we have our tea. This is usually a sandwich or something on toast. Mum and dad do the washing up and I make a cup of tea or coffee. My brother is very lazy and does not do anything. After tea I have a bath and watch T.V. I go to bed about 10.15pm.
